abstract: An animation that starts slowly and then increases speed towards the end of the movement.
overview:
## Return Value

An ease-in animation with the default duration.

## Discussion

An easing animation provides motion with a natural feel by varying the acceleration and deceleration of the animation, which matches how things tend to move in reality. With an ease in animation, the motion starts slowly and increases its speed towards the end.

The `easeIn` animation has a default duration of 0.35 seconds. To specify a different duration, use [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/Animation/easeIn(duration:)].

The following code shows an example of animating the size changes of a [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/Circle] using the ease in animation.

items.name: easeIn(duration:)

items.description: An animation that starts quickly and then slows towards the end of the movement.
